meanings.definition: A type of lettuce with tightly packed, crisp leaves.
meanings.sent1: I picked some fresh crispheads from the garden for our salad.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on crispheads, so I bought a few.
meanings.sent3: Why did the crispheads go to the dance? To have a 'head-spinning' time!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of crispheads, each thought neatly packed and ready to be picked.
meanings.sent5: The crispheads glistened with dew, inviting us to take a crunchy bite.

meanings.definition: The heads of lettuce that are tightly packed and crisp.
meanings.sent1: The crispheads in the fridge stayed fresh for a long time.
meanings.sent2: She tossed the crispheads with dressing to make a delicious salad.
meanings.sent3: The crispheads whispered to each other, 'We are the crunchiest of them all!'
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like crispheads, neatly arranged and ready to be served.
meanings.sent5: The crispheads stood proudly in the garden, their leaves shining in the sun.

meanings.definition: The crispheads of lettuce are popular in salads.
meanings.sent1: Mom always adds crispheads to her famous Caesar salad.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's signature dish features crispheads as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The crispheads threw a party in the bowl, celebrating their salad stardom.
meanings.sent4: In the world of salads, crispheads reign as the kings of crunch.
meanings.sent5: The crispheads danced happily in the salad bowl, knowing they were loved by all.
